profile:
Environmental Services Group works with home owners to remediate hazards in their home that can include but are not limited to mold, lead and asbestos. Items that contain mold, lead and asbestos need to be identified, quantified and a plan of action should be implemented. The health and safety of your family is our primary concern.

See Our Work on www.facebook.com/environmentalservicesgroup
service_area: London Ontario to Oshawa, Barrie and Muskoka, Niagara Falls and Hamilton
services:
* Post Remediation Verification (PRV) sampling (Mold)
    * Sewage Remediation Verification sampling
    * Thermal Imaging and Moisture Mapping of Multi-Level Floods
    * Writing Scopes of Work, Recommendations, and Maintenance Plans
    * Site Supervising and Project Management
    * Asbestos Surveys and Assessments
    * Lead Surveys and Assessments
    * Indoor Air Quality Assessments (Regular Intervals and Emergency   Services)
    * Flood Assessments (Water Damage)
    * Radon Testing and Monitoring
    * Dust Analyses
    * Odour Volatile Organic Compounds
    * Carbon Monoxide and Sewer Gases or Sulfer Gases
name: Environmental Services Group ~ Moldinspections.Ca

profile: Mitigair focuses on radon measurement and mitigation across southern Ontario. From residential systems, to commercial, office space and institution, to new construction projects.  Radiation off radon and its decay products can damage the DNA inside our cells. Scientists estimate that about 20,000 lung cancer deaths per year are related to radon. Radon is a leading cause of lung cancer, second only to cigarette smoking.
